summary: Larryboy, Alfred, and many other citizens of Bumblyburg must face the temptations of the Bad Apple.
cast: Mike Nawrocki|Phil Vischer|Cynthia West|Cydney Trent|Megan Murphy|Tim Hodge|J. Chris Wall|Doug Griffin|Kurt Heinecke|Brian Roberts|Joe Spadaford|Charles R. Vollmer|Andy Youssi
title: VeggieTales: Larry-Boy and the Bad Apple
